Script# 1714: Tail Bundle : Yet another tail -f plugin

= Introduction =

* [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1714 Download]
* [http://vim-scripts.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/1714%20Tail%20Bundle Subversion]

= Details =

This Tail plug-in combines the ideas from [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1374 vimscript#1374] and [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1692 vimscript#1692] into one plugin offereing both preview and tabed tail functionality. I also added shortcut mapping to "set wrap" and "set number" - which both can be useful when observing log files. 

Last not least I use the new Vim 7.0 autoload feature so this script should load faster and use less memory then there [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1374 vimscript#1374] and [http://www.vim.org/scripts/script.php?script_id=1692 vimscript#1692]
